extension.description: This screensaver addon provides Apple TV aerial screensavers in Kodi
Este complemento habilita el protector de pantalla Aerial de Apple TV para Kodi
extension.news: v3.0.3 (2022-01-01) - New scenes added (Patagonia, Yosemite, Grand Canyon, Iceland, Scotland) - Updated Apple resources.tar entries.json URL - Location All is now sorted before any of the other locations - Fixed bug that was preventing playback or download when HEVC was disabled
